page.title: 06Pupil at Bentworth School
page.content: EDUCATION LOCAL HISTORY Alf is an old man who went to Bentworth School.He liked to play football also he played cricket and rounders.For playtime he had 15 minutes and he thinks he was set all the same work as we would be set now also he thinks he ate the same food.Stick over the behind was the main punishment he got punished for being cheeky to the teachers. His favourite subject was English. The School has changed a lot since Alf was there because there was a big stove in the classroom.There were no real loo's and there were only two classrooms. by Jonathan & Andrew.
